name: mentalhealthnz website
description: Website for Mental Health in Tech NZ

scripts.http: npm run build && cd dist && python -m SimpleHTTPServer
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:copy
scripts.publish: cd dist && rm -rf .git && git init && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push --force --quiet 'git@github.com:mentalhealthnz/www.git' master:gh-pages

author: Navishkar Rao
